episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6603_1201: What are you two doing?

Alola! Sophocles is inspecting the
electrical systems.
I’m just helping him out!
Hey, Soffy. You seem pretty busy lately.
Big Mo!

Actually, some people have been making
unapproved modifications, so I’ve been working
on lot of repairs related to that.
Well, that’s a shame...

I know you shouldn’t do unapproved modifications,
but some of them are really clever!

Someone made a really cool system that diverts
electricity. It’s so cool, I almost want to try copying
it myself!
I wonder if we know the person who did that.

I know! Why don’t you have Volkner here help you
out with those repairs?
Yeah! Volkner’s good with gadgets, too!

Well...to tell you the truth, I’m the one who made
those modifications!

It was just a small...tinkering with the circuits so
I can charge up stuff wherever I go.
So you’re talking about this thing?

Yeah. If you get a Pokémon to use electricity on it,
it’ll adjust the wattage and you can use it to
charge your devices!
What about this one?!
Uh, yeah! That’s—
Oh, wow! This is so cool!

Um! If you have some time, could you teach me
some stuff while we’re repairing this together?
Sure, of course!

I was the one who modified it, after all. Let me
help you out!
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6604_1201: So Selene’s partner Pokémon is Rowlet!

I hear they can rotate their necks almost a full 180
degrees, but I don’t think I’ve actually seen one do
that before...
Wouldn’t it be awesome to see it in person?

Hey, maybe we can ask Rowlet if he could rotate
his neck for us!
Whoa! It can rotate that much?!

I have to get a sketch of this, quick! Ah, wait!
Please don’t move yet!
That was so strange, I can’t take my eyes off it!
Thank you so much, Rowlet! You too, Selene!

I guess we shouldn’t ask too much all at once, so
you can rest now, but...

Could you maybe show us that again some
other time?
I think he’s saying, “Sure, anything for you two!”

OK, great. And we won’t ask again after that. We
don’t want to work you too hard, Rowlet!
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6605_1201: Oh, so you do modeling work in Unova!

You’re so pretty, I was shocked when I first
saw you!

You should come visit us in Alola! I bet everyone
would be shocked like I was!

There are a lot of sight-seeing spots, and we’d be
happy to show you around!
Yes, one day I would love to...
Was that a shockingly bad pun?

S-sorry! I was trying to think of something clever
to say back, but I couldn’t think of anything!

I think I get it now, Elesa! You’re a really funny
person, aren’t you!

With all your overthinking and your laid-back
personalities, you two sure take your time
responding to things sometimes, huh?

I think anyone would be shocked to bits the first
time they heard Elesa tell a joke like that!
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6606_1101:
Kahili kept up with her daily training, even after
she came to Pasio.

One day, as she was practicing, she saw a pair of
familiar faces.
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6606_1201: Selene! Winona! Nice to see you two.
Hello. Are you training again today?
Yes. I completed my training up in the mountains...

so now I’m working on perfecting my form on
flatter ground.

Kahili, you’re so great at Pokémon battles
and golf!

There aren’t any golf tournaments here on Pasio,
so I’m afraid I’m getting rusty. I’m thinking of
adjusting my training regimen.
What were the two of you up to?

You can get a feel for the wind when you watch
the clouds floating by.

Hey, Kahili. Doesn’t the sky today remind you
of Alola?

I’m not sure... It’s been a while since I’ve taken a
good look at the sky.
So...if it’s OK, do you mind if join you?
Not at all! But what about your training?
I’ll adjust it and add in some scheduled rest.
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6607_1201:
Hmmm! Look at the marvelous composition of these
Pokémon that made their way here!

I have to draw them before this opportunity passes
me by!
Yeah!
What’s all the ruckus?

Guzma! Plumeria! Could you stand over there for
a sec?
Uh...

Yes, yes! The cuteness of the Bug-type Pokémon is
emphasized by the addition of these two rugged
humans! Great composition, Mina!
Ehe!
What are we, statues?
That’s the first time I’ve seen Mina get so excited.
And Guzma really mellowed out, huh?

Yep. Everyone is starting to change as a result
of experiencing new things in a new place.
A new place...
I’ve also done a lot since I moved to Alola.

I made a lot of friends there, and I think that
changed me a lot!

That’s great to hear, especially as someone
who grew up in Alola.

By the way, Elio...have you found the island of
Pasio to be a nice change?

Yeah! I think there’s a lot to discover here—and
loads of people to meet!

I’m gonna keep on challenging myself to do all
sorts of things on Pasio.
That’s the spirit! I’m rooting for you, Elio.
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6608_1201: Crash! Crash! Crasher Wake!
You’re amazing, Master Wake!

Looks like that battle sparked a little flame in you,
eh, Mr. Masked Royal?
The Masked Royal?! He’s here?!

Nah, how could he? I’m sure Molayne just meant
something else.
(Shhh! Don’t blow my cover!)
If it isn’t Professor Kukui!
Perfect timing! I have a message to pass on!

Tell the Masked Royal that I’ll be waiting for him
in the ring!
Wow, is that a challenge?

Understood. I’ll let him know, but I’m sure he’d be
more than happy to accept!
Finally, a battle with the Masked Royal!
But obviously, my master’s gonna win!
No way! The Masked Royal is!
Absolutely not! It’ll be my master! My master!
Guess we can’t let our fans down, huh?
Yeah!

The Masked Royal would never lose! Have you
heard about his training? It’s incredible!
Hm?
In the morning, he wrestles with Bewear!
After lunch, he does push-ups with Machamp!

And at night, he trains by taking Incineroar’s
Darkest Lariat over and over again!
Selene?! Isn’t that stretching the—
REALLY?! That’s hard-core!

Right? Well, not that I’ve seen him train in person,
but I hear that’s what he does!

I know! Let’s go and see what his training is like
together sometime!

Looks like I’m gonna have to crank up my workout
routine to build more muscle right away...

I guess that’s the price we pay to keep the
dream alive!
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6609_1201: Hey there! I’m stopping by!
Let’s hang out!
Sorry, Mallow. Now’s not really a great time.
We’re making some curry.

And it’s not going so well, so we don’t have much
time to play.

That’s what I figured! Don’t worry, I brought a
special helper with me!
Alola, Siebold, Gloria!
You should let Selene taste that curry!
Huh? But it’s not ready yet.
Oh, it’ll be fine! Just let her taste it!
Here I go! Digging in!
*munch munch*

The curry still isn’t complete, so we can’t
guarantee it’ll taste any good.
Whoa! This is amazing!

The meat and the vegetables balance each other
out so perfectly!

And the sauce—the main flavor and life of the
curry—matches well with the ingredients!

And this fragrant smell! It just makes you crave
more and more!
This curry is AWESOME!

But if you don’t mind me mentioning something
about the flavor...it’s a little spicy.

If there were a little more sweetness, it would add
depth to the taste!
Sweetness?! That’s it!

We need to sweeten it up to balance out the
spice! That’s what we were missing!

Thanks, Selene! I think we’ll be able to make a
great curry now!
Selene the food critic was a huge success!
episode_event_sub_ep_yo_mizuki/6610_1201: Ah! That battle was a lot of fun!
Yes, it was a good battle.
My heart’s on fire like a Blast Burn!
Kahili! You’ve gotten stronger again!

I would hope so. I did join the Elite Four at your
request, despite my reservations...

But it is rude to face a challenger with anything
less than your best performance.

About that, Kahili... Are you sure you’re OK with
where you are now?
What do you mean?

You know, I was thinking the same thing. After
all, you’re so strong, and you’re the champion of
the island challenge...
I bet you’d be a perfect fit to be Alola’s Champion!
That’s quite flattering.

However, I think I would prefer to remain in the
Elite Four.
Really? Why is that?
Well...
That’s a secret.
Aw, why won’t you tell us?

It’s getting late. It’s about time you two headed
back for the day.
I guess you’re right. Shall we?
See you tomorrow, Professor Kukui and Kahili!
I don’t need to be the Champion...

After all, the next generation of Trainers—kids like
them—are going to blow onto the scene and kick
up some wind.
Right, Professor?
Yeah.

They’re gonna be the wildest Hurricane anyone
could ever imagine!
